products.title: Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy Fruit Fusion 270g
products.description: Mix up Essential Amino Energy by itself with cold water or stack it with your favourite powdered supplements. Mix two scoops for a mild energy level, four scoops for intense energy level, and 6 scoops for intense energy level.
products.ingredients: Contains Soy (Lecithin).Check with a qualified health care professional before taking this product if you are pregnant or nursing a baby, under 18 years of age, have any known or suspected medical conditions, and/or if you are taking any prescription or OTC medications.

products.title: USN BCAA +EAA Blue Raspberry 400g
products.description: USN's BCAA Complete Amino EAA is a high impact amino acid ready to mix powder. With 6500mg of essential amino acids plus Taurine, Beta-alanine and patented AstraGin™ to aid absorption.
products.ingredients: INGREDIENTS: L-leucine, Thickener (polydextrose), L-isoleucine, L-valine, Taurine, Coconut water powder (from Cocos nucifera), Acids (Citric acid, Malic acid), Beta-alanine, Flavouring, Sodium Citrate, Magnesium salts of citric acid, L-phenylalanine, L-threonine, L-lysine HCl, Potassium Chloride, Sweetener (Sucralose), Acidity Regulator (disodium phosphate), Spirulina powder (from Arthrospira Platensis), L-histidine HCl monohydrate, L-tryptophan, Astragin™ (from roots of Panax ginseng and Astragalus membranaceous), L-methionine, Pyridoxine HCl.

products.title: Holland & Barrett Vitamin C & Zinc Blackcurrant Effervescent 20 Tablets
products.description: Vitamin C and Zinc contribute to the normal functioning of the immune system. Vitamin C contributes to the protection of cells from oxidative stress. Vitamin C increases iron absorption, supports normal collagen formation and energy-yeilding metabolism.
products.ingredients: Citric Acid, Vitamin C (as L-Ascorbic Acid), Acidity Regulator (Sodium Hydrogen Carbonate), Sweetners (Sorbitol, Sucralose), Polyethyene Glycol, Zinc Gluconate, Blackcurrent Flavouring, Colour (Beetroot Red).

products.title: James White Drinks Organic Ginger Zinger Shot 70ml
products.description: An intense Organic ginger experience full of warmth and a great natural taste for true ginger lovers. Designed to invigorate the senses with the naturally powerful flavour of ginger. Made with the real thing, crushed ginger juice, pressed apple and water. s
products.ingredients: Organic Apple Juice (57%), Organic Ginger Juice (26%), Water, Anti-Oxidant: Ascorbic Acid.

products.title: Grenade .50 Calibre Pre-Workout Killa Cola 25 x 23g
products.description: Grenade .50 Calibre is the next generation pre-workout from multi award winning sport nutrition experts Grenade. The formula combines research-validated ingredients including creatine mono, beta alanine, citrulline marlate and bitter orange peel powder.
products.ingredients: Creatine Monohydrate, Beta Alanine, Citrulline Malate, Acid (Citric Acid), Theobroma Cacao Seed, anti –caking agents (calcium silicate, silicon dioxide, tri calcium phosphate), Flavouring, Resistant Dextrin, Glycerol, Colour, (caramel powder), Arginine, BCAA Blend (L-Leucine, L-Valine, L-Isoleucine), Potassium Bicarbonate, Caffeine, Taurine, Beetroot Extract, Sweetener (sodium cyclamate, acesulfame, sucralose, sodium saccharin)

products.title: Reflex XFT Rest & Maintain Chai Latte 500g
products.description: Rest and Maintain is low in fat and sugar, and contains 20g of protein from a mixture of whey protein isolate and whey protein concentrate. This protein composition is perfect for topping up your protein intake throughout the day - it also contains digestive enzymes and friendly bacteria.
products.ingredients: Protein Concentrate, Cocoa Powder (chocolate flavour only), Flavouring, Thickener (Cellulose Gum), Sea Salt, Digestive Enzyme Complex (DigeZyme® (Alpha-Amylase, Neutral Protease, Cellulase, Lactase, Lipase)), Sweetener (Sucralose), Bacillus Coagulans (LactoSpore®), Sweetener (Steviol Glycosides), Multi-Component Protected Lactic Acid Bacteria (Bifidobacterium bifidum, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus rhamnosus).

products.title: Bondi Coffee Workout Booster Blend 28 x 5g
products.description: *Niacin (B3) contributes to normal energy-yielding metabolism *Vitamin B6 helps to reduce tiredness and fatigue *Choline contributes to normal lipid metabolism *Choline contributes to the maintenance of normal liver function
products.ingredients: Instant Coffee (70%) (Contains 5% micro ground roasted coffee beans), Beta-Alanine (15%), Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs) from Coconut Oil (10%),Choline Bitartrate (providing 100mg of Choline per 5g Serving), Guarana Seed Extract (2%) (Contains 22% Caffeine), Branched Chain Amino Acids (2:1:1) (1%), Nicotinamide, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin B12 (Methylcobalamin)

products.title: High5 Cycle Kit
products.description: The HIGH5 Cycle Pack is a selection of cyclists’ favourite products. Whether you are new to sports nutrition or stocking up for a training sessions or an event, this pack is full of all your nutrition essentials. This pack is suitable for vegetarians and contains an assortment of bestselling flavours.
products.ingredients: Glucose Syrup, Water, Maltodextrin, Fruit Juice Concentrate (Raspberry 1%, Cranberry), Acidity Regulators (Citric Acid, Sodium Citrates, Malic Acid), Caffeine, Sodium Chloride, Preservatives (Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate), Natural Flavouring.

products.title: USN 3XT Pump 3-In-1 Pre-Workout Cherry 840g
products.description: 3XT is USN’s 3 in 1 pre-workout! Caffeine increases long lasting energy, improves mental clarity and focus, whilst Vitamin B6 & B12 contribute to energy, carbohydrate and protein metabolism, as well as supporting immune function.
products.ingredients: L-citrulline-Dl-malate, Beta-alanine, Crystalline fructose, Thickener (Polydextrose), Betaine anhydrous, Anti-caking agents (Silicon dioxide, Calcium silicate), L-arginine HCl, Beetroot extract (25:1), Alpinia extract (From roots of Alpinia galanga) (10:1), N-acetyl-L-tyrosine, Flavouring, Maltodextrin, Caffeine anhydrous, Sweeteners (Acesulfame K, Sucralose), Sodium citrate, AstraGin™ (Panax notoginseng root extract and Astragallus membrenaceus root extract), Colour (Allura Red AC**), Pyridoxine HCl, Riboflavin, Nicotinamide, Thiamine HCl, Cyanocobalamin

products.title: Phizz Orange Multivitamin & Hydration Effervescent 10 Tablets
products.description: Electrolyte Replenishment Phizz contains the 5 key electrolytes lost through sweat - sodium, potassium, chloride, magnesium and calcium. Potassium contributes to normal muscle function.
products.ingredients: Acid, Salts (Potassium Chloride, Sodium Chloride), Malic Acid,Natural Orange Flavour, Beetroot Powder (Colouring Agent),Sucralose (Sweetener), Calcium-D-pantothenate, Niacinamide

products.title: Sparta Nutrition Pre-Workout Blue Raspberry ICEE 264g
products.description: Sparta Nutrition Pre-Workout is a delicious ultra-premium energy formula designed to elevate your performance. This fully-loaded formula was built to simply deliver an amazing pre-workout experience by supporting energy and focus to help bridge the gap between you and peak performance.
products.ingredients: See Label. Other Ingredients: Citric acid, Natural & artificial flavours, Silicon dioxide, Malic acid, Sucralose, Blue 1.

products.title: Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard Pre Workout Watermelon 330g

This formula has also raised the bar on flavour, setting the Gold Standard for both performance and taste.
